alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 4:59PM EDT until April 22 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN FLORENCE...DILLON AND NORTHWESTERN MARION COUNTIES... At 458 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hamer to near Mars Bluff, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Latta, Sellers, Blue Brick, Hamer, Mars Bluff, Francis Marion University, Floydale, and South Of The Border. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
